column5: COME ON GUYS!!! SIGN UP FOR THE 2010 OFC Tournament!!! We need 3 more anglers to join in order to assign new teams!!! LETS GO NOW!!!
Ya Guys sign up the other teams need all the help they can get TEAM 7 is coming on strong HAHA Richard:clapping:
Seriously I want to start adding numbers to some team!!!
Team selections are done! Check out the Toruney discussion area under "Roster" for your new team and introduce yourselves!
GOOD JOB GUYS!!!!TEAM 7 FOR THE WIN!!!!
crap, can we still sign up

You can definitely still sign up. It took me just over a month to finally get on a team! My scale and measuring tape hasn't arrive from bass pro so I'm glad I haven't caught anything huge yet! hahaha.  ***Correction, It's here and it didn't cost me extra
come on guys sign up, it'll be fun
ok ill sign up..how does it all work?
would sign up but require friends
read the rules and stuff at the tournament discussion
only 3 more people needed i believe
